animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food.
💧 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I am a common pet.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I eat plants and insects.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.
Spots cover my body.
🌳 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🌱 I am often kept as a pet.
🐰 I can be white, brown, or black.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I'm the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I am a predator.
☀️ I am a cat, but much larger.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and sometimes hiss. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
🥚 I can be venomous.
🦎 Some people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I fly at night and make a 'whoo' sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I am a bird of prey.
🐭 I hunt small animals.
👀 I have excellent night vision.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each individual.
🌿 I eat grass.
🐎 I am related to the horse.

animal.question: I carry my home on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a reptile.
🥬 I like to eat leafy greens.
🐢 I can live for a very long time.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. Birds love to splash in me! What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I often come after a shower.
🚶‍♀️ You can jump in me if you wear your boots.
🐕 I am often found on the street after rainfall.

weather.question: I'm hot and bright and yellow. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I can make you feel warm.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🌞 I disappear when the clouds arrive.

weather.question: I am white and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain, and sometimes I block the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy animals.
🌧️ I am made of water droplets.
☁️ I can be big or small.

weather.question: I fall from the sky when it's cold. I'm like frozen rain, but I'm white and powdery. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am cold.
⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You will need to wear mittens to play with me.

weather.question: I make the trees dance and the kites fly high. You can't see me, but you can feel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can blow leaves off trees.
🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.
💨 I can make your hair messy.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. You can only see me if the sun is shining. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have the colors of a prism.
💧 I am a beautiful arc in the sky.
🍀 Some people believe there is a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky. You need an umbrella when I come out. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I help plants grow.
💦 I make puddles.
🌧️ Ducks enjoy me.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds. I spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can cause a lot of damage.
🏡 People sometimes have to leave their homes when I come.
🌪️ I form over warm ocean waters.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky, often followed by a loud boom. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡I am very dangerous to be near.
🌩️ I am associated with thunderstorms.
💥 I am electricity in the sky.

weather.question: I'm a frozen ball that falls from the sky during a thunderstorm. I can be as small as a pea or as big as a baseball! What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice.
⚾ I can damage cars and roofs.
⛈️ I am formed in strong thunderstorms.
